mods.abstract: Run Away. THE slave JUBA, aged about 45 years, 5 feet 5 inches in height, left the plantation of the undersigned pm the 5th of July, 1857. Juba speaks French and English, he is stout, and very black. His thumbs are both mashed. A liberal reward will be given to any person who will bring him back to the undersigned, or to Joel H. Sandoz. AURELIEN St. JULIEN. Lafayette, July 18th, 1857.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
